author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-1943 Ensure components which are not satisfied any longer if a service is unregistered are deactivated. Before this would only happen if the component had the service bound, which is not always the case (for example for ComponentFactory components).
FELIX-1944 Ensure Reference.getServiceReferences() returns null if no services are bound to the component (an empty array used to be returned).

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-1922 Always mimick existing configuration to component factory instances. In case of Configuration Admin service not providing configuration, an empty configuration is placed to simulate existence. Reason for this is that component factories do not obey configuration-policy=require for satisfaction setting.

author: shankar
msg: Including CGI Installation instruction. Fixing issue AXIS2C-1385

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-1942 Add new state (FactoryInstance) which is like the Active state but disposes off the component on deactivation instead of just deactivating.

author: markt
msg: Only apply filtering to the files that need it else non-text files will get corrupted.
